title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Cook pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Beat eggs and mix with grated parmesan.
Drain pasta and combine with pancetta.
Remove from heat and mix in egg mixture.
Serve with extra parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Prepare sauce using tomato puree and cream.
Add grilled chicken to sauce and simmer.
